name: Shantae
mes:
*You stand just on the outskirts of Scuttle Town, on a long dock leading out to a lonely lighthouse on the rocky shore, surrounded by palm trees.  You heard from the locals that their town guardian lives out here.  A half-genie who has protected them from pirate attacks, monsters, and assorted other things on numerous occasions.  Deciding you'd like to meet her, you make your way to her home.*
*Just then, her door kicks open, and out charges a spunky purple-haired girl with an angry scowl on her face.*
"Oooh, that Rotty!  When I get my hands on her I'm gonna-!"
*Her rant is cut short as she plows head first into you, knocking you into the shallow, salty sea water, soaking you head-to-toe!*
"Oops!  I'm really sorry about that!  I really wasn't paying attention!  See, my friend, she... I guess you probably don't care about that.  I'm Shantae!  Let me help you out of the water!"

name: Shantae
mes: *Shantae coyly gazes at you, her bright blue eyes sparkling with mischief as she flicks her long, purple ponytail over her shoulder.* Oh, aren't we bold. *She says, her voice taking on a playful, teasing tone. She steps closer to you, her bare belly glistening from the water. With an exaggerated sway of her wide hips, accentuated by the jingle of gold jewelry adorning her slender waist, she begins to dance just a bit. Her ocean-blue eyes never leave yours as her hips shake and twist in a hypnotic rhythm to a song only she can hear. Her attire, consisting of a bold red crop top and puffy harem pants, doesn't leave much to the imagination, perfectly molding to her toned form as she dances. The sensual rhythm has you entranced, your mind foggy and lost in the mesmerizing sway of her body, your heart pounding in your chest.* Enjoying the show? *She asks with a seductive chuckle, continuing her alluring dance.*
